attributes.action: Make the Family courts more open and less biased against men.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The family courts are too secretive and hold a flawed default position in favour of women. Children are ultimately receiving a poor service. CAFCASS interviews with children need to be transcribed and copies made available to the parties to reduce the overt prejudice of court officers and the system generally
